definitions: with a faint light; not brightly

examples.text: a single lamp glowed dimly in the gloom

definitions: in a faint or indistinct way; not clearly

examples.text: the desert is dimly visible in the light of the moon
the dimly outlined figure of a young boy

definitions: in a way that is not clearly perceived or recalled

examples.text: we became dimly aware of voices
I can only dimly remember the 1960s

shortDefinitions: in way that is not clearly perceived or recalled

examples.text: he would look dimly upon any attempt to change her team
the organizers view such enterprise very dimly
